Magmahost.com - Professional and affordable hosting services.

ROCK SOLID HOSTING
Great Support and Great Service Since 2007



VPS Control Panel
You can manage your VPS from an simple control panel this allows you to reboot, rebuild, view statistics, RAM Usage and much more.


LargeDisk Plan - Hot Deal Limited Time only! (10 available)
---------------------------
128 MB RAM + 512MB Burst
80GB HDD
250GB BW
IP(s): 1 (More Available)
Price: $5.50/mo

[More Information] | [Order Now]
---------------------------
This is Unmanaged VPS you can alternatively buy a support package for an additional $10/mo




##############################
# Product Add-on's
##############################
# Extra 100GB Diskspace $16.00 USD/mo
# 5 Additional IP's 6.50 USD/mo
#
# You can add any of these add-on's during checkout.
##############################


Our VPS nodes are located in Dallas, Texas (Infomart).

By default the OS will be CentOS but you can rebuild via your control panel.
Setup is usually in the hour or less if it's not setup in 24 hours we will give you a months free hosting.

Operating Systems:
CentOS 5.3
CentOS 5 minimal
Debian 5.0
Debian 5 minimal
Fedora 11
Ubuntu 8.04
Ubuntu 9.04

If you require any other OS please contact support and we can arrange for your OS to be setup (Unix Only)

Payment methods;
Paypal
2CheckOut


FAQ:
Do you allow IRC: We do allow IRC but only on this package (LargeDisk)
Can you enable iptables modules?: Yes we can, you simply have to contact our support department.
